{"id":546669586,"lang":"java","time":"9 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1630329842,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/546669586/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"39 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * public class ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode next;\n *     ListNode() {}\n *     ListNode(int val) { this.val = val; }\n *     ListNode(int val, ListNode next) { this.val = val; this.next = next; }\n * }\n */\nclass Solution {\n    int carry(int x){\n        return x>=10? 1:0;\n    }\n    public ListNode addTwoNumbers(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) {\n        ListNode ans = new ListNode();\n        ListNode res = ans;\n        int c=0;\n        while(l1!=null || l2!=null){\n            if(l1!=null && l2!=null){\n                ans.next=new ListNode((l1.val+l2.val+c)%10);\n                c=carry(l1.val+l2.val+c);\n                l1=l1.next;\n                l2=l2.next;\n                ans=ans.next;\n            }\n            else if(l1!=null){\n                ans.next=new ListNode((l1.val+c)%10);\n                c=carry(l1.val+c);\n                l1=l1.next;\n                ans=ans.next;\n            }\n            else{\n                ans.next=new ListNode((l2.val+c)%10);\n                c=carry(l2.val+c);\n                l2=l2.next;\n                ans=ans.next;\n            }\n        }\n        if(c!=0){\n            ans.next=new ListNode(c);\n        }\n        return res.next;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
